mobs.long_desc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
mobs.desc: The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.

mobs.long_desc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobs.desc: This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

mobs.long_desc: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobs.desc: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobs.long_desc: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobs.desc: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobs.long_desc: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobs.desc: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobs.long_desc: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobs.desc: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobs.short_desc: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,
mobs.long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobs.desc: Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground. > The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.

mobs.short_desc: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,
mobs.long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobs.desc: Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground. > The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.

mobs.long_desc: the elder druid is here ...he looks very upset about your presence in his home.
mobs.desc: The druid looks quite old.  You would think of him as venerable but yet you know he would be a tough foe.

mobs.long_desc: The young spider is ballooning by you.
mobs.desc: He looks freshly hatched and sprightly.  His young fangs are just growing in as of late.

mobs.long_desc: The quasit blinks in and out, grinning at you.
mobs.desc: Demonic in nature, but more mischievous.  He twiddles his thumbs and creates a magical treasure!

mobs.long_desc: A dwarven guard is here.
mobs.desc: The guard looks very tough and mean.

mobs.long_desc: A dwarven mining worker is here.
mobs.desc: He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked.

mobs.long_desc: A wraith is awaiting your first move here.
mobs.desc: A black, almost transparent wraith.

mobs.long_desc: A giant is here.
mobs.desc: The giant is about 8 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks very strong.

mobs.long_desc: A giraffe is craning it's neck to see you here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A goat is mulling around here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A pelican is swimming around in a shallow pool here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A horse is standing here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A chicken is pecking at the dirt here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A kangaroo hops around here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A very smelly skunk is here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A leopard is eyeing you up and down here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A ferocious lion is here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: There is a bear here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: There is an elephant here.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A little, hairy computer bug is here, trying to mess things up.
mobs.desc: It is one of those irritating little creatures that like to infect innocent and defenceless programs, trying to make them act weird.  Programmers spend countless hours trying to eliminate them, but they are indeed very hardy. DikuMUD is known to be one of their favourite habitats.

mobs.long_desc: Death the Grim Reaper is observing you silently from empty eye sockets.
mobs.desc: The dark-robed skeletal figure radiates an unendurable coldness.

mobs.long_desc: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling, obviously sleeping.
mobs.desc: You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature, though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there, sleeping. The thought of arousing this cruel creaturedoesn'

mobs.long_desc: The small hairy Spider
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: The scaled Basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
mobs.desc: The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbell. It's eyes are glowing pale green.

mobs.long_desc: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
mobs.desc: It's a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any moment now. In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.

mobs.long_desc: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
mobs.desc: This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high. Dressed in purple and black, and carrying a large mace in its hand. In the center of its head are four large tentacles with very sharp points.

mobs.long_desc: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
mobs.desc: This mindflayer is six foot high. It has a small mace in its belt, and is dressed in purple and black cloth. It has four small tentacles in the center of its head.

mobs.long_desc: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
mobs.desc: The wererat is about four foot tall. It looks very much like rat, exept that it is standing.

mobs.long_desc: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
mobs.desc: The gigantic rat is about ten foot long from head to tail and has claws the size of your head looking very nasty.

mobs.long_desc: A bug scuttles towards you, running in small circles around your feet.
mobs.desc: It is a smallish creature, with too many legs to count, obviously very fast. It has a multicoloured carapace (looking much like an oil slick on a puddle), and bright red pinpoint eyes.

mobs.long_desc: The Daemon looks at you expressionlessly, from the comfort of its chair (it feels that way, anyway... You can't see its eyes). Then its attention returns to the screens.
mobs.desc: It appears to be a vaguely man-shaped (but larger than man-sized!) hole in the fabric of reality... looking closely, you can see stars, either inside it, or far beyond it...

mobs.long_desc: A Juggernaut a working its way methodically through this area.
mobs.desc: It is _very_ large, some 10 yds in length, walking on several hundred tiny legs. It is metallic-looking, with large spots of corrosion marring its angular skin. On its sides are large signs, written in an incomprehensible language. On its top, a small eye cluster swivels back and forth continually. A number of tentacles sweeps the ground around it.

mobs.long_desc: A beautiful, butterfly-like thing is fluttering around here.
mobs.desc: It is, on closer inspection, not really an animal, but a variable number of brightly-coloured, translucent planes of breathtaking beauty and delicacy. The planes pulse, waver, sometimes disappear, but are always replaced by another. None of the planes move, but through continuous replacement, the butterfly does, in random sweeps.

mobs.long_desc: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
mobs.desc: This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow and black.

mobs.long_desc: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
mobs.desc: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

mobs.long_desc: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
mobs.desc: The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it. Obviously it no longer fears death.

mobs.long_desc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws it's sword.
mobs.desc: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

mobs.long_desc: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
mobs.desc: The duergar could crush your head as easily as it does those rocks.

mobs.long_desc: A drow commoner walks around on guard duty.
mobs.desc: I doubt he is the type to give directions.

mobs.long_desc: The drow warrior noble stands here guarding his home.
mobs.desc: He looks kind of p.o.ed!

mobs.long_desc: The drow mage noble is here protectng his home.
mobs.desc: The mage prepares to cast a spell...at you!!

mobs.long_desc: The drow priestess is here shouting orders.
mobs.desc: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

mobs.long_desc: The drow master stares at you angrily.
mobs.desc: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

mobs.long_desc: The drow weaponsmaster is here shadow boxing.
mobs.desc: He definitely know his way around in combat.

mobs.long_desc: The Matron Mother of the house is standing here.
mobs.desc: She looks really p.o.ed!!!!

mobs.long_desc: The Matron Mother of the 1st house is waiting for you.
mobs.desc: She looks like she is about to rip your head of and eat it.

mobs.long_desc: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist.
mobs.desc: The yochlol is not in a good mood.

mobs.long_desc: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
mobs.desc: It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

mobs.long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
mobs.desc: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast. She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

mobs.long_desc: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
mobs.desc: A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy pad-lock on the front.

mobs.long_desc: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
mobs.desc: undefined

mobs.long_desc: A small horned lizard flicks his tounge and slithers away.
mobs.desc: A cute little lizard, that is, if you like reptiles!

mobs.long_desc: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
mobs.desc: It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.

mobs.long_desc: This strange magical water seems to move and shape itself.
mobs.desc: It looks like a very wet way to die.

mobs.long_desc: A large dreadful snake.
mobs.desc: It looks hungry.

mobs.long_desc: A small green snake.
mobs.desc: It looks harmless.

mobs.long_desc: A small centipede.
mobs.desc: It looks complete harmless.

mobs.long_desc: A ugly kobold.
mobs.desc: It looks ugly.

mobs.long_desc: The orc walks around, looking for someone to kill.
mobs.desc: You notice an evil look in his eyes

mobs.long_desc: A large orc, really mean.
mobs.desc: He looks dreadful.

mobs.long_desc: A small hobgoblin stands here.
mobs.desc: The hobgoblin looks quite lost.

mobs.long_desc: A brown snake watches you.
mobs.desc: The snake looks quite mean.

mobs.long_desc: A white centipede is here.
mobs.desc: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

mobs.long_desc: A large hobgoblin is here.
mobs.desc: The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous.

mobs.long_desc: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone ? ) to eat.
mobs.desc: Well he doesn't seem to be friendly.

mobs.long_desc: A mountain lion is here growling at you.
mobs.desc: The lion looks very nasty with huge claws and big teeth.

mobs.long_desc: A hill giant is here tossing some rocks around.
mobs.desc: The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall. By his actions you come to the conclusion that he's not very inteligent.

mobs.long_desc: A large mean-looking troll is here.
mobs.desc: Well looks dangerous.!

mobs.long_desc: A large green snake, looks like a guardian for an evil force.
mobs.desc: You see a evil creature.

mobs.long_desc: A green kobold is here.
mobs.desc: It looks slimy..

objects.ground: A dark black robe is lying here.

extras.text: The robe seems to be filled with swirling patterns of stardust.  You feel part of yourself being sucked into the robe, but you don't care...  Becoming a part of such a divine object would be a true honor!

objects.ground: A dark black cape is lying here.

extras.text: The cape gently pulls in the light so evenly and perfectly that the cape seems to simply be a black void.  It is breathtakingly beautiful!  Looking at it is all it takes to know that this cape is obviously divine.

objects.ground: A dark black staff has been left here.

extras.text: This staff is truly amazing!  It looks as if it could wield itself!  It seems to made of the purest darkness of night, absorbing all light that would reflect from it.  Pulsing softly, this staff is obviously divine, and well beyond the ken of mortal creatures.

objects.ground: What looks like a clear fang of a snake lies here.

extras.text: This looks to be a piece of clear crystal constructed from magic to protect it owner in an attack.  It looks like the fang of a beast of prey.

objects.ground: A fragment of darkness lies ill placed here.

extras.text: Darker than any night sky, this blade appears to be crafted from a solid piece of darkness.  Not a gleam nor sparkle, the blade seems to swallow light rather than repeal it.

objects.ground: A large old book lies here.

extras.text: This is no ordinary book, this is the book of healing that for centuries has kept Nordus free of plagues and serious illnesses.  The whole book is magical, and there are records of how its power prevented the village of Nordus being overcome by plagues on several occasions.

objects.ground: A set of scale-plated bracers lies here.
&9&bA long mace with the word 'N&0&5i&9&bg&0&5h&9&bt&0&5b&9&br&0&5i&9&bn&0&5g&9&be&0&5r&9&b' etched into the shaft lies here humming.&0
A fiery scimitar lies burning here.

extras.text: Composed entirely of a dark adamantium, the scimitar-shaped blade writhes and crackles as a thick, black smoke billows off its edge while the handle is as cold to the touch as the wintry nights of Mt.  Frostbite.  Balancing the hand guard and mounted at the end of its slope on either side are two perfectly rounded fiery gemstones.

objects.short: a whip with a &5&bvelvet handle&0 and stinging barbs
objects.ground: A beautiful whip with &5&bvelvet handles&0 lies here.

extras.text: This whip is long and has several cat-tails on the end, eight of them to be exact.  Each is tipped with a little metal spike that appears never to become dull.  Even up and down the entire length of the leather portions of the whip are little magically made barbs.  The handle is stripped &5&bcrushed velvet,&0 soft in the hand, yet hard underneath.  There is a small knot of wood at the base of the handle with the sign that a weapon's master created this fine whip with the aid of a magician.

objects.ground: &2A small green tree sits here digging into the ground.&0

extras.text: This is a small green tree grown in the shape of a shield.  It has several branches coming out of the sides acting as perfect spikes on the sides of the shield.  There is a heavy knot in the center almost as though the tree were designed to actually act as a shield.  It is a strong wood, firm and hard and ready to deflect most any blow landed upon it.  There are even some small leaves hanging off of the branches which neatly conceal a small hole in the wood.

rooms.name: Metamorpho's Nexus
rooms.description: You seem to be standing on a cloud of stardust.  All around you the stars twinkle brightly.  This is obviously the center of several universes.  There seem to be exits to all of them here, but it would take you the rest of your natural life to discover all of their secrets.

extras.text: The cloud may look ethereal, but you don't seem to be in any danger of floating away... although it would be difficult to tell if you were...
The stars twinkle hypnotically. You feel yourself beginning to slip away...
